description: Truro City sign free agent goalkeeper Dan Lincoln until the end of the season.
title: Dan Lincoln: Truro City sign free-agent goalkeeper
title_page: Dan Lincoln: Truro City sign free-agent goalkeeper - BBC Sport
maintext:
Truro City have signed free agent goalkeeper Dan Lincoln until the end of the season.
The 29-year-old will provide cover for first-choice Dan Lavercombe as the Tinners vie for the National League South title.
The Cornish club are a point behind leaders Worthing with six games to go in a tight race for first place.
He joins the club having previously spent time at Truro's sixth-tier rivals Salisbury, where he played 10 times earlier this season.
Lincoln has also had spells at Slough Town, Dorking Wanderers, Farnborough and Hampton & Richmond.
He is also a talented cricketer - he came up through the ranks at Middlesex and played for the club in the T20 Blast in 2019.
He also he had a spell at Kent and has most recently played Minor Counties cricket for Berkshire.
